languages.text: "К несчастью, аномалии столь же беспощадны к ксеносам, что и к людям. Муаран утверждает, что это — следствие нанесенный нами атак на оскверненный сектор... И еще что-то неуважительное про мон-кай, что астропат не разобрал из-за помех".

"Unfortunately, the anomalies are as deadly to xenos as they are to humans. Muaran claims that this is the consequence of our attacks on the corrupted sector... then he added something disrespectful about 'the mon-keigh' that the Astropath couldn't make out due to interference."
languages.original_text: "К несчастью, аномалии столь же беспощадны к ксеносам, что и к людям. Муаран утверждает, что это — следствие нанесенный нами атак на оскверненный сектор... И еще что-то неуважительное про мон-кай, что астропат не разобрал из-за помех".

traits.locale_text: "Unfortunately, the anomalies are as deadly to xenos as they are to humans. Muaran claims that this is the consequence of our attacks on the desecrated sector... And then had added something more disrespectful about the mon-keigh that the Astropath couldn't make out due to the interference."

"Unfortunately, the anomalies are as deadly to xenos as they are to humans. Muaran claims that this is the consequence of our attacks on the desecrated sector... And then had added something more disrespectful about the mon-keigh that the Astropath couldn't make out due to the interference."

"Unfortunately, the anomalies are as deadly to xenos as they are to humans. Muaran claims that this is the consequence of our attacks on the corrupted sector... then he added something disrespectful about 'the mon-keigh' that the Astropath couldn't make out due to interference."

"Unfortunately, the anomalies are as deadly to xenos as they are to humans. Muaran claims that this is the consequence of our attacks on the desecrated sector... then something more disrespectful about the mon-keigh was mentioned that the Astropath couldn't make out due to the interference."

"Unfortunately, the anomalies are as deadly to xenos as they are to humans. Muaran claims that this is the consequence of our attacks on the desecrated sector... then something more disrespectful about the mon-keigh was mentioned that the Astropath couldn't make out due to the interference."

"Unfortunately, the anomalies are as deadly to xenos as they are to humans. Muaran claims that this is the consequence of our attacks on the corrupted sector... then he added something disrespectful about 'the mon-keigh' that the Astropath couldn't make out due to interference."

"Unfortunately, the anomalies are as deadly to xenos as they are to humans. Muaran claims that this is the consequence of our attacks on the corrupted sector... then he added something disrespectful about 'the mon-keigh' that the Astropath couldn't make out due to interference."

"Unfortunately, the anomalies are as deadly to xenos as they are to humans. Muaran claims that this is the consequence of our attacks on the corrupted sector... then he added something disrespectful about 'the mon-keigh' that the Astropath couldn't make out due to interference."

languages.text: “遗憾的是，那些幽灵无论是对人类还是异形都同样凶残，穆兰声称这是由于我们攻击腐化区域造成的后果……随后他说了些不敬之语，关于猴子的什么什么，但由于干扰，星语者无法听清他具体说了什么。”
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, the anomalies are as deadly to xenos as they are to humans. Muaran claims that this is the consequence of our attacks on the corrupted sector... then he added something disrespectful about 'the mon-keigh' that the Astropath couldn't make out due to interference."

traits.locale_text: “遗憾的是，那些幽灵无论是对人类还是异形都同样凶残，穆兰声称这是由于我们攻击腐化区域造成的后果……随后他说了些不敬之语，关于猴子的什么什么，但由于干扰，星语者无法听清他具体说了什么。”
“遗憾的是，那些幽灵无论是对人类还是异形都同样凶残，穆兰声称这是由于我们攻击亵渎区域造成的后果……随后他说了更多不敬之语，关于猴子的什么什么，但由于干扰，星语者无法听清他具体说了什么。”

languages.text: «Por desgracia, las anomalías son tan letales para los xenos como para los humanos. Muaran afirma que es consecuencia de nuestros ataques al sector corrupto... y después añadió algo irrespetuoso sobre los mon-keigh que el Astrópata no pudo entender con las interferencias».
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, the anomalies are as deadly to xenos as they are to humans. Muaran claims that this is the consequence of our attacks on the corrupted sector... then he added something disrespectful about 'the mon-keigh' that the Astropath couldn't make out due to interference."

traits.locale_text: «Por desgracia, las anomalías son tan letales para los xenos como para los humanos. Muaran afirma que es consecuencia de nuestros ataques al sector corrupto... y después añadió algo irrespetuoso sobre los mon-keigh que el Astrópata no pudo entender con las interferencias».

languages.text: 「残念ながら、アノマリーはゼノにとっても人間にとっても致命的です。ムアランは、これは私たちが汚されたセクターを攻撃したせいだと主張しています...そのうえ、モン＝ケイについてもっと失礼なことを言っていました。感応通信官は妨害のせいで聞き取ることができませんでしたがね」
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, the anomalies are as deadly to xenos as they are to humans. Muaran claims that this is the consequence of our attacks on the corrupted sector... then he added something disrespectful about 'the mon-keigh' that the Astropath couldn't make out due to interference."

traits.locale_text: 「残念ながら、アノマリーはゼノにとっても人間にとっても致命的です。ムアランは、これは私たちが冒涜されたセクターを攻撃したせいだと主張しています...そのうえ、モン＝ケイについてもっと失礼なことを言っていました。感応通信官は妨害のせいで聞き取ることができませんでしたがね」
「残念ながら、アノマリーはゼノにとっても人間にとっても致命的です。ムアランは、これは私たちが冒涜されたセクターを攻撃したせいだと主張しています...そのうえ、モン＝ケイについてもっと失礼なことを言っていました。感応通信官は妨害のせいで聞き取ることができませんでしたがね」

languages.text: « Malheureusement, les anomalies s'en prennent aussi violemment aux xénos qu'aux humains. Muaran a affirmé que c'était la conséquence de nos attaques contre le secteur corrompu... avant d'ajouter, sur un ton peu respectueux, quelques mots au sujet des mon-keigh que l'astropathe n'a pas pu capter parmi les interférences. »
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, the anomalies are as deadly to xenos as they are to humans. Muaran claims that this is the consequence of our attacks on the corrupted sector... then he added something disrespectful about 'the mon-keigh' that the Astropath couldn't make out due to interference."

traits.locale_text: « Malheureusement, les anomalies s'en prennent aussi violemment aux xénos qu'aux humains. Muaran a affirmé que c'était la conséquence de nos attaques contre le secteur corrompu... avant d'ajouter, sur un ton peu respectueux, quelques mots au sujet des mon-keigh que l'astropathe n'a pas pu capter parmi les interférences. »

languages.text: "Leider sind die Anomalien für Xenos ebenso tödlich wie für Menschen. Muaran sagt, das sei die Folge unserer Angriffe auf den verderbten Sektor ... dann fügte er etwas Respektloses über den Chem-Pan-Sey hinzu, was der Astropath aufgrund von Interferenzen aber nicht verstehen konnte."
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, the anomalies are as deadly to xenos as they are to humans. Muaran claims that this is the consequence of our attacks on the corrupted sector... then he added something disrespectful about 'the mon-keigh' that the Astropath couldn't make out due to interference."

traits.locale_text: "Leider sind die Anomalien für Xenos ebenso tödlich wie für Menschen. Muaran sagt, das sei die Folge unserer Angriffe auf den verderbten Sektor ... dann fügte er etwas Respektloses über den Chem-Pan-Sey hinzu, was der Astropath aufgrund von Interferenzen aber nicht verstehen konnte."

"Leider sind die Anomalien für Xenos ebenso tödlich wie für Menschen. Muaran sagt, das sei die Folge unserer Angriffe auf den entweihten Sektor ... und dann wurde noch etwas sehr Respektloses über den Chem-Pan-Sey gesagt, was der Astropath aufgrund von Interferenzen aber nicht ganz ausmachen konnte."

languages.text: "Ne yazık ki anomaliler, insanlara karşı olduğu kadar zenolara karşı da ölümcül etkiye sahip. Muaran, bunun yozlaşmış sektöre saldırılarımızın bir neticesi olduğunu iddia ediyor... Sonrasında mon-keighler hakkında daha riayetsiz bir laf daha söyledi ancak parazit nedeniyle Astropat bundan bir mana çıkaramadı."
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, the anomalies are as deadly to xenos as they are to humans. Muaran claims that this is the consequence of our attacks on the corrupted sector... then he added something disrespectful about 'the mon-keigh' that the Astropath couldn't make out due to interference."

traits.locale_text: "Ne yazık ki anomaliler, insanlara karşı olduğu kadar zenolara karşı da ölümcül etkiye sahip. Muaran, bunun yozlaşmış sektöre saldırılarımızın bir neticesi olduğunu iddia ediyor... Sonrasında mon-keighler hakkında daha riayetsiz bir laf daha söyledi ancak parazit nedeniyle Astropat bundan bir mana çıkaramadı."
